snippet: A conversation that cannot have lasted more than 10 minutes changed the way I thought about my life.
abstract: Op-Ed article by art history Prof William Hood describes way in which brief conversation with Rev Dr Martin Luther King Jr changed way he thought about his life, and way in which he approached teaching art history.
lead_paragraph: A conversation that cannot have lasted more than 10 minutes changed the way I thought about my life.

headline.seo: My Dinner With Martin Luther King Jr.
